name: Hotmail/Outlook redeem whitespace
description: Recover ads banner space (bottom and right side). Hides "Upgrade to Office 360" link. Reduces the height of lines in the folders list. Reduces the height of lines in emails listing in the 3 modes: without preview pane, with preview pane at the bottom and with preview pane on the right side. For more userscripts, styles, extensions, tips, ..., visit my programming page.
additional_info:
2023/05/07: ads sidebar
2023/02/03: fix line height on mouse over
2022/11/09: fix changes in css classnames
2022/05/16: fix changes in css classnames
2022/04/25: hide ad in message slot
2022/03/31: fix for alternate layout
2022/03/29: fix changes in css classnames
2022/03/03: fix changes in css classnames
2022/01/20: fix message line padding in alternate layout
2021/10/18: one stylename changed + fix height of "all settings" button
2021/07/02: again, changes in names
2019/06/21:
 - MS changed the names of the styles. If I missed something, please post a comment.

2019/05/12:
 - fixed listing line's height with preview displayed on the right
 - fixed line's height in all predefined modes (new hotmail options)

2019/04/24:
 - refined style for page with reading pane hidden or shown at bottom (when "attachment preview" enabled)
 - gained a couple pixels on page with reading pane on the right
 - fixed line height in folder list

Initial release 2018/12/17
